title: Runaway Nano-Swarm Zone Adventure #1
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Nano Containment Chamber
rooms.description: A sterile white chamber with reinforced glass walls. Swirling clouds of metallic nano particles shimmer in the air beyond the glass. Red emergency lights pulse rhythmically. A decontamination station sits in the corner, and a sealed airlock door leads deeper into the facility.

items.name: decontamination station
items.description: A medical station with storage compartments for emergency supplies

items.name: emergency protocol document
items.description: A laminated instruction sheet for containment breaches
items.text: EMERGENCY PROTOCOL: In case of nano swarm breach, activate inhibitor field immediately. Access code is the year of first successful nano assembly: 2047. Lead researcher Dr Chen has override authority. Inhibitor injector stored in research lab.

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard labeled Level 3 Clearance

items.name: reinforced observation window
items.description: A thick glass window showing the nano swarm containment area
items.text: Through the window you see millions of microscopic machines forming shifting patterns. A warning label reads: DANGER - Autonomous nano swarm active. Do not breach containment.

items.name: emergency equipment locker
items.description: A metal locker containing protective gear and tools

items.name: protective hazmat gloves
items.description: Heavy duty gloves for handling hazardous materials

items.name: reinforced airlock door
items.description: A heavy airlock door with a card reader and biometric scanner

rooms.name: Nano Research Laboratory
rooms.description: A high tech laboratory filled with electron microscopes, fabrication equipment, and holographic displays. Workstations are covered with research notes and data tablets. A large fabrication chamber dominates the center of the room. The walls are lined with storage cabinets and a locked safe. An emergency exit door glows green on the far wall.

items.name: lead researcher workstation
items.description: Dr Chen's personal workstation covered in notes and equipment

items.name: research notes from Dr Chen
items.description: A tablet containing detailed research logs
items.text: Research Log Final Entry: The nano swarm has achieved unexpected autonomy. We must use the inhibitor injector to shut it down. The safe combination is my employee ID: 8-1-6-2. The fabrication chamber contains the last nano sample. Emergency pod bay is our only escape route.

items.name: chemical storage cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with multiple shelves of scientific supplies

items.name: nano neutralizing agent
items.description: A vial of chemical compound designed to deactivate nano machines

items.name: laboratory wall safe
items.description: A secure safe built into the wall with a digital keypad

items.name: nano inhibitor injector
items.description: A specialized device that can shut down nano swarm activity

items.name: nano fabrication chamber
items.description: A sealed chamber used for nano machine assembly

items.name: sealed nano sample
items.description: A containment vial with a small amount of dormant nano machines

items.name: main holographic display
items.description: A floating display showing facility status and security information
items.text: FACILITY STATUS: Containment breach in progress. Evacuation recommended. Emergency pod bay accessible via security clearance. Questions: Who authorized this research? Where are the nano machines contained? What device stops the swarm?

items.name: emergency pod bay door
items.description: A reinforced door leading to the evacuation area. A security terminal displays three verification questions.

password_questions.question: Who authorized this research?
password_questions.hint: Check the research notes to find the lead researcher's name

password_questions.question: Where are the nano machines contained?
password_questions.hint: Think about where you started and what the first room was called

password_questions.question: What device stops the swarm?
password_questions.hint: The emergency protocol and research notes mention the shutdown device

rooms.name: Emergency Escape Pod Bay
rooms.description: You have reached the evacuation zone! A sleek escape pod sits ready in its launch tube, its engines humming with power. Through the viewport you can see the facility below, with nano swarms spreading through the corridors. The pod's hatch is open and waiting. Safety at last!

items.name: emergency escape pod
items.description: A small spacecraft designed for emergency evacuation, fully fueled and ready to launch

items.name: pod launch console
items.description: The control panel for launching the escape pod
items.text: LAUNCH SEQUENCE READY. All systems nominal. Destination: Orbital Station Alpha. Estimated flight time: 15 minutes.

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You board the escape pod and initiate the launch sequence. The pod blasts away from the facility as you watch the nano swarm containment zone shrink below you. You've secured the inhibitor technology and escaped with your life. Mission accomplished! You win!
